entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow early this afternoon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 22 March 2023
